sdata.j: ↑検尿↑↓けんにょう↓を|マシン|に↑入↑↓い↓れるだけで、↑具合↑↓ぐあい↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いとこを↑診断↑↓しんだん↓して、↑対処↑↓たいしょ↓↑法↑↓ほう↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてくれるんだ。
sdata.e: Simply put in a sample of your urine and the computer will diagnose your problem and tell you what you can do about it.

sdata.e: Support vector machines are supervised learning models used for classification and regression analysis.
